sentences.en: A disruption of any part of the digestive system upsets the whole system.
sentences.cn: 其中一部分发生紊乱将会影响整个消化系统.

sentences.en: Cell damage by disruption of the cell wall and plasmamembrane must precede virus entry.
sentences.cn: 病毒进入植物之前,细胞肯定由于细胞壁和(或)原生质膜的破坏已经受到伤害.

sentences.en: He could draw men round him and keep them bound to him; while his powerful attraction was there, disruption was out of the question.
sentences.cn: 他能够把人们吸引到他的周围而且保持他们的忠心；而他的强大吸引力所在之处，就不可能有分裂。

sentences.en: His neck injury was a major disruption to his life.
sentences.cn: 颈部受伤严重破坏了他的生活.

sentences.en: I can't afford another disruption today, so am going home to work.
sentences.cn: 我今天无法承受另外一次干扰, 所以我要回家工作了.

sentences.en: Meanwhile the disruption would be tremendous.
sentences.cn: 在这期间,就会一片混乱.

sentences.en: Measures would be taken to avoid disruption to marine life during construction.
sentences.cn: 施工期间会采取措施来减低对海洋生物的影响.

sentences.en: So the enezuelans devised a structure to minimise the disruption.
sentences.cn: 因此委内瑞拉就建立一种结构来使公司崩溃的可能性达到最小.

sentences.en: Such a disruption is provoked in two ways.
sentences.cn: 这种破坏来自两个方面.

sentences.en: Such storms cause considerable disruption in magnetic prospecting operation.
sentences.cn: 这种磁暴对磁法勘探产生严重的破坏.

sentences.en: The absence of the information is causing us delay and disruption.
sentences.cn: 资料的欠缺正在造成我方的工期延误和工程中断.

sentences.en: The best diagnosis and treatment of the pelvic arteries disruption is embolization.
sentences.cn: 髂内动脉造影及动脉栓塞是较好的诊断及治疗方法.

sentences.en: The contradiction between agriculture, hunting, and herding caused great disruption in the west.
sentences.cn: 农业 、 狩猎和牧业间的矛盾在西部引起了很大的混乱.

sentences.en: The disruption has now spread and is affecting a large part of central Liberia.
sentences.cn: 混乱局面已经扩散，正在影响利比里亚中部的大片地区。

sentences.en: The incident led to the disruption of the family.
sentences.cn: 那件事导致了家庭的破裂.
罢工造成了大规模的混乱。

sentences.en: These granules also can be broken down by physical disruption, added by soaking in water.
sentences.cn: 这些颗粒也能借助于水浸的物理破坏作用而分解.

words.tran_cn: 破坏的；分裂性的；制造混乱的
破坏；使瓦解；使分裂；使中断；使陷于混乱

phrases.tran_cn: [经]市场破坏；[经]市场瓦解；[经]市场干扰

trans.tran_en: a situation in which something is prevented from continuing in its usual way
